Item.Name: ID
Item.Hint: ID number, press LIST key for name/ID search.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
/* Replace trigger with code from WHEN-VALIDATE-TRIGGER as part of
4.0 conversion */
S$_VALID_ID(:ID,:PIDM,:FULL_NAME,:CONFID_IND,:DCSD_IND);
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_COPY_FLD_ATTR;
:GLOBAL.SECRFRM := 'SOAIDEN';
EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:global.current_user,:global.secrfrm,'QUERY');
G$_RESET_GLOBAL;
--
 IF :GLOBAL.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LIST_VALUES_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 G$_CHECK_VALUE ((:KEY_BLOCK.ID IS NULL),
 NULL, TRUE, TRUE);
--
 NEXT_FIELD ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
/* Move code to POST_CHANGE trigger as part of 4.0 conversion */
NULL;
--S$_VALID_ID(:ID,:PIDM,:FULL_NAME,:CONFID_IND,:DCSD_IND);
--G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM STVTERM
 WHERE STVTERM_CODE = :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG ;
 ELSE
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG >>
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_CODE_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Item.Name: HOLD_TERM_CODE
Item.Hint: Term;Press LIST for valid codes,COUNT QUERY HITS for student terms.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM STVTERM
 WHERE STVTERM_CODE = :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG ;
 ELSE
 RETURN ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 << CALL_INVALID_CODE_MSG >>
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'INVALID_CODE_MSG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: EXIT_BLOCK
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_CHECK_VALUE (NOT (:PIDM IS NOT NULL
 AND :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE IS NOT NULL),
'*ERROR* Valid term and ID must be entered prior to leaving block.', TRUE
 , TRUE);
--
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SGBSTDN_LEVL_CODE
 FROM SGBSTDN
 WHERE SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF = 
 (SELECT MAX(SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF)
 FROM SGBSTDN
 WHERE SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF <= :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE
 AND SGBSTDN_PIDM = :PIDM )
 AND SGBSTDN_PIDM = :PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :SGBSTDN_LEVL_CODE ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND,
 '*ERROR* Person is not a student, cannot register.',
 TRUE);
 END ;
--
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM SFBETRM
 WHERE SFBETRM_TERM_CODE = :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE
 AND SFBETRM_PIDM = :PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND,
 '*ERROR* Person not registered; cannot assess.', TRUE);
 END ;
--
 << SKIP_AROUND >>
--
 go_block('SSRMEET');
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;
 execute_trigger('clear_dups');

 go_block('fees');
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;

 go_block('payments');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 execute_trigger('get_totals');
--
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := '5' ;
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := '0' ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_CHECK_VALUE (NOT (:PIDM IS NOT NULL
 AND :ID IS NOT NULL),
 '*ERROR* A valid ID must be entered before proceeding.',
 TRUE, TRUE);

Block.Name: SSRMEET
Block.WhereClause:
where ssrmeet_crn in (select sfrstcr_crn from saturn.sfrstcr,saturn.stvrsts where sfrstcr_pidm=:key_block.pidm and sfrstcr_term_code=:key_block.keyblck_term_code and sfrstcr_rsts_code=stvrsts_code
and stvrsts_incl_sect_enrl='Y'
and ssrmeet_term_code=:key_block.keyblck_term_code)

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
select distinct sfrstcr_crn,
 ssbsect_subj_code,
 ssbsect_crse_numb,
 ssbsect_seq_numb,
 sfrstcr_credit_hr,
 substr(stvcamp_desc,1,4)
 into :sfrstcr_crn,
 :ssbsect_subj_code,
 :ssbsect_crse_numb,
 :ssbsect_seq_numb,
 :sfrstcr_credit_hr,
 :campus_desc
 from sfrstcr,
 ssbsect,
 stvcamp
 where sfrstcr_crn= :ssrmeet_crn
 and sfrstcr_term_code = :key_block.keyblck_term_code
 and sfrstcr_pidm = :key_block.pidm
 and sfrstcr_crn = ssbsect_crn
 and ssbsect_term_code = :key_block.keyblck_term_code
 and sfrstcr_camp_code = stvcamp_code;

Trigger.Name: CLEAR_DUPS
Trigger.TriggerText:
first_record ;
:key_block.hold_scrn := :ssrmeet_crn ;
--
<<clear_loop>>
next_record;
 if :ssrmeet_crn is null then
 goto clear_done ;
 end if;

 if :sfrstcr_crn = :key_block.hold_scrn then
 :sfrstcr_crn := '' ;
 :ssbsect_subj_code := '' ;
 :ssbsect_crse_numb := '' ;
 :ssbsect_seq_numb := '' ;
 :sfrstcr_credit_hr := '' ;
 :campus_desc := '' ;
 end if;
:key_block.hold_scrn := :ssrmeet_crn ;
goto clear_loop;
--
<<clear_done>>
first_record;

Block.Name: SHRTCKN
Block.WhereClause: where shrtckn_pidm = :pidm and (shrtckn_term_code = :keyblck_term_code or :keyblck_term_code is null)
Block.OrderByClause: order by shrtckn_term_code desc, shrtckn_subj_code, shrtckn_crse_numb

Item.Name: SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE
Item.Hint: Term Code; press 'Sel' button or DUP RECORD on desired line for course details.

Trigger.Name: KEY-DUPREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
:GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO := :ID ;
 :GLOBAL.KEY_TERM := :SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE ;
 :GLOBAL.KEY_AH_SUBJECT := :SHRTCKN_SUBJ_CODE ;
 :GLOBAL.KEY_AH_COURSE := :SHRTCKN_CRSE_NUMB ;
 :GLOBAL.KEY_AH_CRN := :SHRTCKN_CRN ;
IF :SHRTCKN.SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'WHERE_TO_GO' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;
 END IF;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SHRTCKL_LEVL_CODE
 FROM SHRTCKL
 WHERE SHRTCKL_PIDM = :PIDM
 AND SHRTCKL_TCKN_SEQ_NO = :SHRTCKN_SEQ_NO
 AND SHRTCKL_TERM_CODE = :SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :SHRTCKL_LEVL_CODE ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND, NULL, TRUE);
 END ;
--
 IF :HLD_LEVL IS NULL THEN
 NULL ;
 ELSIF :HLD_LEVL = :SHRTCKL_LEVL_CODE OR ( :HLD_LEVL IS NULL
 AND :SHRTCKL_LEVL_CODE IS NULL ) THEN
 NULL ;
 ELSE
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SHRTCKG_GRDE_CODE_FINAL, SHRTCKG_GMOD_CODE,
 SHRTCKG_CREDIT_HOURS
 FROM SHRTCKG
 WHERE SHRTCKG_PIDM = :PIDM
 AND SHRTCKG_TERM_CODE = :SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE
 AND SHRTCKG_TCKN_SEQ_NO = :SHRTCKN_SEQ_NO
 AND SHRTCKG_SEQ_NO = (
 SELECT MAX(SHRTCKG_SEQ_NO)
 FROM SHRTCKG
 WHERE SHRTCKG_PIDM = :PIDM
 AND SHRTCKG_TERM_CODE = :SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE
 AND SHRTCKG_TCKN_SEQ_NO = :SHRTCKN_SEQ_NO ) ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :SHRTCKG_GRDE_CODE_FINAL,
 :SHRTCKG_GMOD_CODE, :SHRTCKG_CREDIT_HOURS ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND, NULL, TRUE);
 END ;

ProgramUnit.Name: S$_VALID_ID
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE S$_VALID_ID(ID IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 PIDM IN OUT NUMBER,
 FULL_NAME IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 CONFID_IND IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 DCSD_IND IN OUT VARCHAR2)
IS
 ENTITY_IND VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN
 CONFID_IND := '';
 DCSD_IND := '';

 
DECLARE
 CURSOR ID_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM,
 (SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ') || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' ||
 DECODE(SPRIDEN_MI,'','',SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_MI,1,1) || '. '),
 SPRIDEN_ENTITY_IND
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_ID = ID
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL;
 BEGIN
 OPEN ID_CURSOR ;
 FETCH ID_CURSOR INTO PIDM, FULL_NAME, ENTITY_IND;
 IF ID_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CHECK_FOR_PREVIOUS_ID ;
 ELSE
 GOTO CHECK_ENTITY;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
<< CHECK_FOR_PREVIOUS_ID >>
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PREV_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM,
 (SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ') || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' ||
 DECODE(SPRIDEN_MI,'','',SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_MI,1,1) || '. '),
 SPRIDEN_ID,
 SPRIDEN_ENTITY_IND
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM IN (
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_ID = ID
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND = 'I' )
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PREV_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PREV_CURSOR INTO PIDM, FULL_NAME, ID, ENTITY_IND;
 IF PREV_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 MESSAGE('*ERROR* ID does not exist; press LIST for name/ID search.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('*WARNING* Previous ID replaced with current ID.' );
 END IF;
 END ;
--
<<CHECK_ENTITY>>
 IF ENTITY_IND = 'C' THEN
 MESSAGE('*ERROR* ID identifies a company; must enter a person ID.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
--
<< CHECK_DECEASED >>
 DECLARE
 ALERT_BUT NUMBER;
 CURSOR DCSD_CURSOR IS
 SELECT '*DECEASED*'
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_DEAD_IND = 'Y'
 AND SPBPERS_PIDM = PIDM ;
 BEGIN 
 OPEN DCSD_CURSOR ;
 FETCH DCSD_CURSOR INTO DCSD_IND;
 IF DCSD_CURSOR%FOUND AND
 ID <> :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO THEN
 ALERT_BUT := G$_DISPLAY_ALERT(
 'S$_CAUTION_ALERT','Warning: This person is deceased.');
 END IF;
 END ;
--
<< CHECK_CONFID >>
 DECLARE
 ALERT_BUT NUMBER;
 CURSOR CONFID_CURSOR IS
 SELECT '*CONFIDENTIAL*'
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_CONFID_IND IS NOT NULL
 AND SPBPERS_PIDM = PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN CONFID_CURSOR ;
 FETCH CONFID_CURSOR INTO CONFID_IND ;
 IF CONFID_CURSOR%FOUND AND
 ID <> :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO THEN
 ALERT_BUT := G$_DISPLAY_ALERT('S$_CAUTION_ALERT',
 'Warning: Information about this person is confidential.'); 
 END IF;
 END ;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0_B2K
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0_B2K IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 4.0

AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: TVI_AUDIT_TRAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE TVI_AUDIT_TRAIL IS
BEGIN
 /* ************ TVI Audit Trail ****************
1. 16-FEB-01 SLPeterson
 Used shacrse as template to construct TZASCHD.
 a) I am unsure what is calling TOADEST(print selection form) when
 this form is retrieved.????? Decided since users see this form now
 that leaving it will not be an issue.
 b) left shacrse of form intact rather than try to remove and weed
 out what name and term searches use.
 c) per phone conversation with Gilbert Padilla users are using 
 only page 1 so that is all that is recreated here.
2. 16-OCT-01 SLPeterson
 *Changed where clause of SSRMEET block to select sfrstcr_rsts_code
 of 'RE' and 'RW' for web registration.
 *Modified credit_hrs total to include 'RW' also.
3. 30-JUL-02 SPeterson
 Converted to Forms6i
 */
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL IS
BEGIN
 /* ************ TVI Audit Trail ****************
1. 16-FEB-01 SLPeterson
 Used shacrse as template to construct TZASCHD.
 a) I am unsure what is calling TOADEST(print selection form) when
 this form is retrieved.????? Decided since users see this form now
 that leaving it will not be an issue.
 b) left shacrse of form intact rather than try to remove and weed
 out what name and term searches use.
 c) per phone conversation with Gilbert Padilla users are using 
 only page 1 so that is all that is recreated here.
2. 16-OCT-01 SLPeterson
 *Changed where clause of SSRMEET block to select sfrstcr_rsts_code
 of 'RE' and 'RW' for web registration.
 *Modified credit_hrs total to include 'RW' also.
3. 30-JUL-02 SPeterson
 Converted to Forms6i
4. 08-SEP-03 SPeterson
 *Minor changes to sizing and location of fields and frames for INB 
 5.x environment.
 */
 NULL;
END;

Trigger.Name: GET_TOTALS
Trigger.TriggerText:
select sum(sfrstcr_credit_hr)
 into :credit_hrs
 from sfrstcr,stvrsts
 where sfrstcr_term_code = :key_block.keyblck_term_code
 and sfrstcr_pidm = :key_block.pidm
 and sfrstcr_rsts_code=stvrsts_code
 and stvrsts_incl_sect_enrl='Y';
--16-OCT-01 SLPeterson and sfrstcr_rsts_code = 'RE' ;

 select sum(tbraccd_amount)
 into :fee_total
 from tbraccd,
 tbbdetc
 where tbraccd_pidm = :key_block.pidm
 and tbraccd_term_code = :key_block.keyblck_term_code
 and tbraccd_detail_code = tbbdetc_detail_code
 and tbbdetc_type_ind = 'C' ;

begin
 select sum(tbraccd_amount)
 into :pay_total
 from tbraccd,
 tbbdetc
 where tbraccd_pidm = :key_block.pidm
 and tbraccd_term_code = :key_block.keyblck_term_code
 and tbraccd_detail_code = tbbdetc_detail_code
 and tbbdetc_type_ind = 'P' ;
end ;

begin
 :balance := :fee_total - :pay_total ;
end ;

Trigger.Name: WHERE_TO_GO
Trigger.TriggerText:
:PAGE0_TERM_HEADER := '' ;
--
 :GLOBAL.KEY_AH_CRN := :SHRTCKN_CRN ;
--
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM SHRTTRM
 WHERE SHRTTRM_PIDM = :PIDM
 AND SHRTTRM_TERM_CODE = :SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :PAGE0_TERM_HEADER ;
 IF PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 MESSAGE(
'*ERROR* No academic history records found for this id.' ) ;
 RETURN ;
 ELSE
 GOTO NULL_SWITCHES ;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
 IF G$_NCHK(:PAGE0_TERM_HEADER <> 'Y') THEN
 GO_BLOCK( 'SHRTCKN' ) ;
 END IF ;
--
 << NULL_SWITCHES >>
 :PAGE0_PRE_CATALOG_IND := '' ;
--
 :PAGE0_SECTIONS_PRESENT_IND := '' ;
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_FOR_PRECATALOG' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_FOR_SECTIONS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 IF :PAGE0_PRE_CATALOG_IND = 'Y' THEN
 IF :GLOBAL.SECRSYS = 'Y' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CALL_SHATCKP' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 :GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED := 'Y';
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,'SHATCKP','');
:GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED := '';
 END IF ;
 ELSE
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_WHICH_FORM' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: INVALID_CODE_MSG
Trigger.TriggerText:
MESSAGE(
'*ERROR* Invalid code; press LIST for valid codes.' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG
Trigger.TriggerText:
NULL ;
 MESSAGE( '*ERROR* Invalid function; press SHOW KEYS key' ||
 ' for valid functions.' ) ;

Trigger.Name: GLOBAL_COPY
Trigger.TriggerText:
:KEY_BLOCK.ID := :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO ;
--
 IF :ID IS NOT NULL THEN
 NEXT_FIELD ;
 PREVIOUS_FIELD ;
 END IF ;
--
 :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE := :GLOBAL.KEY_TERM ;
--
 IF :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN
 NEXT_FIELD ;
 PREVIOUS_FIELD ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: GET_TERM
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_CHECK_VALUE ((:PIDM IS NULL),
'*ERROR* A valid ID and degree number must be entered for this function.'
 , TRUE, TRUE);
--
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'SAVE_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
-- CALL_FORM( 'SHQTERM', NO_HIDE, DO_REPLACE, QUERY_ONLY ) ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,'SHQTERM','QUERY');
--
 :KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE := :GLOBAL.VALUE ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_WHICH_FORM
Trigger.TriggerText:
:PAGE0_CALL_FORM := 'Y' ;
--
 :GLOBAL.KEY_AH_CRN := :SHRTCKN_CRN ;
--

/*------ commented Emma --------
 IF :PAGE0_SECTIONS_PRESENT_IND = 'Y' THEN
 IF :GLOBAL.SECRSYS = 'Y' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CALL_SHATCKS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
-- CALL_FORM( 'SHATCKS', NO_HIDE, DO_REPLACE, NO_QUERY_ONLY ) ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,'SHATCKS','');
 END IF ;
 ELSE
 IF :GLOBAL.SECRSYS = 'Y' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CALL_SHATCKC' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
:GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED := 'Y';
EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,'SHATCKS','');
:GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED := '';
 END IF ;
 END IF ;
*/
 IF (:global.SECRSYS = 'Y') THEN
 GOTO YES_SECURITY ;
 ELSE
 GOTO NO_SECURITY ;
 END IF ;
--
 << NO_SECURITY >>
 IF :PAGE0_SECTIONS_PRESENT_IND = 'Y' THEN
:GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED := 'Y';
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,'SHATCKS',''); 
:GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED := ''; 
 ELSE
:GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED := 'Y';
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER,'SHATCKC',''); 
:GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED := ''; 
 END IF ;
 NULL ;
 RETURN ;
--
 << YES_SECURITY >>
 IF :PAGE0_SECTIONS_PRESENT_IND = 'Y' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CALL_SHATCKS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ; 
 ELSE
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CALL_SHATCKC' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ; 
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_FOR_SECTIONS
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM SSBSECT
 WHERE SSBSECT_TERM_CODE = :SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE
 AND SSBSECT_CRN = :SHRTCKN_CRN ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :PAGE0_SECTIONS_PRESENT_IND ;
 END ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_FOR_PRECATALOG
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM SHRTTRM
 WHERE SHRTTRM_PIDM = :PIDM
 AND SHRTTRM_TERM_CODE = :SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE
 AND SHRTTRM_PRE_CATALOG_IND = 'Y' ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO :PAGE0_PRE_CATALOG_IND ;
 END ;

Trigger.Name: ENABLE_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;
IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE_LBT',ENABLED) = 'FALSE' THEN
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE_LBT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('KEYBLCK_TERM_CODE_LBT',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_ON);
END IF;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ID_LBT',ENABLED,PROPERTY_ON);

Trigger.Name: KEY-CLRFRM
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'SAVE_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('ENABLE_KEYS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 CLEAR_FORM ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LOAD_FORM_HEADER' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('CLOSE_WINDOWS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;

Trigger.Name: WHEN_WINDOW_ACTIVATED_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW IS NULL OR
 :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW NOT IN ('G$_OPT_WINDOW', 'SHRTCKN_WINDOW') THEN
 G$_SET_INST_PROPERTY;
END IF;
 G$_SET_WIN_PROPERTY;
IF :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW IS NOT NULL AND
 :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW <> 'G$_OPT_WINDOW' THEN
 IF :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW = 'MAIN_WINDOW' THEN
 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'KEY_BLOCK' THEN
 G$_DETERMINE_CURSOR_LOCATION ('KEY_BLOCK.ID');
 ELSE
 G$_DETERMINE_CURSOR_LOCATION ('SHRTCKN.SHRTCKN_TERM_CODE');
 END IF;
 ELSIF :SYSTEM.EVENT_WINDOW = 'SHRTCKN_WINDOW' THEN
 G$_DETERMINE_CURSOR_LOCATION ('SHRTCKN.SHRTCKN_CRSE_TITLE');
 END IF;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:GLOBAL.SECRSYS :='';
IF GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(USER_INTERFACE) = 'CHARMODE' THEN
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('SHRTCKN_WINDOW',POSITION, 252, 85);
ELSE
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('SHRTCKN_WINDOW',POSITION, 246, 68);
END IF;
--
G$_SET_WIN_PROPERTY ;
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LOAD_FORM_HEADER' ) ;
G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;

G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
G$_SET_INST_PROPERTY;
IF :GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED = 'Y' THEN
 NEXT_BLOCK;
 :GLOBAL.FORM_WAS_CALLED := '';
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN_NEW_BLOCK_INSTANCE_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CHECK_KEYS = 'Y' THEN
 :CHECK_KEYS := 'N';
 GO_BLOCK ('KEY_BLOCK');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;
 :CHECK_KEYS := 'N';
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('DISABLE_KEYS');
END IF;
